This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Fixed issue caused by `AdGuard URL Tracking` filter.

<hr>

@DandelionSprout or @iam-py-test Could you please take a look?
It seems that this rule:
```adblock
$removeparam=/^utm_/i,domain=~redir.tradedoubler.com|~sendgb.com|~allegro.pl|~tix.axs.com|~transfernow.com|~carrefourpl.snrpage.com|~justdial.com
```
from `Legitimate URL Shortener` also causes this issue.

issue.title: Реклама в почте mail.ru | Ads on mail.ru
issue.body:
@sindzicat commented on [Sat Mar 16 2019](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForWindows/issues/2511)

Здравствуйте. Сегодня зашёл в почту mail.ru и офигел: появился правый вертикальный блок с рекламой. Кому надо удалить, добавьте в пользовательский фильтр

```
e.mail.ru/api-proxy/rb-mimic/
```

и всё будет работать.

Андрей.

---

Hello!

Today I log in mail web interface from mail.ru and found the vertical right block with 2-3 ads. To remove this block just add a new rule in user filters:

```
e.mail.ru/api-proxy/rb-mimic/
```

It will fix this problem.

Best regards,
Andrey.

comment.body:
Для VK WorkMail я решил проблему двумя фильтрами в Adblock Plus:
[e.mail.ru#?#div:-abp-has(>](http://e.mail.ru/#?#div:-abp-has(%3E) div.fill-parent)
[e.mail.ru#?#div>](http://e.mail.ru/#?#div%3E) div> div> div> div> div> div:-abp-contains(О Рекламодателе)
